CustomField.formula: IMAGE( CASE( RecordType.Name , "Direct Debit", "/resource/0000000000000/dd", /* dd */ "Debit/Credit Card", "/resource/0000000000000/cc2", /* cc */ "Cash/Cheque", "/resource/0000000000000/cash2", /* cash */ "/resource/0000000000000/transparent3d"), /* Transparent */ "status color")
CustomField.label: Type
